name: Literably
headline: Early literacy assessment software for elementary schools
description: Literably is a literacy assessment system that screens K-8 students for reading difficulties, monitors their progress as readers, and diagnoses skill gaps. Literably's mobile and web apps allow schools to administer assessments online that otherwise are administered manually. As a result, teachers can spend much less time testing and more time teaching.

founders.name: Tyler Borek, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CEO at Literably. Previously at MATCH Charter Schools and the New York City Department of Education.

raw_markdown='We are proud to announce that Literably is joining
![A colorful H representing the logo for the brand, Heggerty. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/6696a7b26b2192c819d85681_Heggerty%20logo%20normal.png)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/632a07c9c3cae416c2038ccc_Literably_LOGO%20600px%20\(2022\).png)](https://literably.com/<http:/www.literably.com>)

### Live event • September 28, 2023 at 3:30pm PST
[Register now for a chance to win $200 gift card!](https://literably.com/<https:/us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GWhyDHtNTymUsOoUz4bEvg#/registration>)
# Build Great Readers with the Science of Reading
Join hundreds of schools and districts who love our award-winning, human-centric approach to reading assessment. 
[Request a demo](https://literably.com/</pricing>)
![Students practice reading on their computers with Literably. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e785f127d0ae505aa7ae98_online-reading-assessment.png)
## Our Assessments
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/6749f68fd7ae08d96cf41169_schema.png)
### Universal Literacy Screener
The Literably Screener measures K-5 students’ acquisition of foundational literacy skills, identifies those at risk for reading difficulties including dyslexia, and pinpoints areas for targeted instructional support. The Literably Screener was developed with R&D funding from the US Department of Education and is supported by industry-leading psychometric research.
![Phonological awareness logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/634ee99527828725f3b56829_PA-hp.svg)
### Phonological Awareness
Hear your students' growing awareness of phonology, from basic (e.g. isolation) to advanced (e.g. substitution).
#### Also assess in Spanish!
![phonics logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65b97681a59ffb5bffb0af9b_Phonics%20logo.svg)
### Phonics
Hear your students progress from letter sounds to multi-syllabics, and see what reading intervention activities they need.
#### Also assess in Spanish!
![oral reading fluency logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65b976d11ea0083f9c347c45_ORF%20logo.svg)
### Oral Reading Fluency (ORF)
Teachers see and hear student’s oral reading of authentic grade level or decodable texts, without weeks of testing.‍
#### Also assess in Spanish!
![Vocabulary logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65b978b4bc1b2a2b12cdacf9_vocab%20logo.svg)
### Vocabulary
Understand your students’ vocabularies from all the angles, including picture vocabulary, synonyms, and fill-in-the-blank.
![reading comprehension logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65b9797ba59ffb5bffb298c8_readingcomplogo.svg)
### Reading Comprehension
Use this online reading assessment to see how your students grapple with diverse texts and question types. 
![Spelling-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65bbfa811e87530350136a6e_Spelling%20logo.svg)
### Spelling
See exactly where encoding is breaking down, down to the specific grapheme - phoneme correspondence. 
![Rapid Automatized Naming logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65bbfa5494ed9e86c6640244_RAN%20logo.svg)
### Rapid Automatized Naming (RAN)
Flag students who may need extra support with foundational skills. Includes all 4 classic task types: objects, colors, letters, and numbers. 
## Why Literably? 
“We’re learning so much more about our students.”Literably partners with your school or district to provide actionable online reading assessment data in 24 hours, so you can see and hear what your students need. Your students assess independently, and you get intuitive reports that pinpoint reading intervention needs, enabling more targeted instruction and faster growth. 
### Live event
## Elevating the Science of Reading
Unveiling Literably's Latest Innovations
September 28, 2023 - 3:30pm PST
[RSVP today](https://literably.com/<https:/us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GWhyDHtNTymUsOoUz4bEvg#/registration>)
Register today for a chance to win a $200 Amazon Gift Card
## Why do teachers love Literably?
### Save Weeks of Instructional Time
Teachers can sit with students or have them assess independently. Either way, you’ll get results you can see and hear in 24 hours. Without weeks spent testing, teachers can focus on growth and reading interventions. 
![Examples of a phonics and fluency assessment on Literably.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e7883ec8ec8e5fcd2eb939_online-reading-level-assessment.png)
![Example of a graded reading assessment on Literably.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e788d59844a0f78c93949c_progress-monitoring-assessment-for-reading.png)
### Ensure Fair and Consistent Scoring
Expert graders listen to and score your online reading assessments, so you get objective data for every student. Focus less on testing, and more on harnessing data to build confident readers. 
![Image of a running record](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65bd32aa5becb0a0197931bc_ensureFairVisual.png)
### See and Hear What Students Need
Get tangible, actionable data on your students’ needs, including transcripts, recordings, and skill performance reports. View student progress over time, and easily share data with parents and colleagues.
![Teacher dashboard on Literably that shows class performance on certain phonics skills. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e7895996d14c7474815b37_reading-programs-for-struggling-readers.png)
"Literably streamlines the reading diagnostic process in a way that drastically minimizes class time needed while also increasing the amount and quality of data provided."
**Nicole Finnegan** Summit Public Schools
"This program is exactly what every teacher has been dreaming about. How do I complete assessments for my whole class without losing a whole day of instructional time?"
**Sarah Nitsos** Wiseburn School District
"Literably is so easy to use and provides valuable information on each student, making it easier to support their reading journey."
**Lorraine Rubinstein** Nutley School District
"A game-changer for doing reading assessments through the school year: easy to use at home or in classroom, scored by a trained human, fast turn-around, records the reading, can be shared with parents."
[**Noreen Axelson**](https://literably.com/<https:/app.delighted.com/people/631781783/feedback>) Park Day School
"Literably saves me so much time! And, I can still hear my students read and see how they answered the questions. What would take me 2-3 days straight (hiring a sub to teach my class so I could just do reading assessments), takes Literably 15-30 minutes. Amazing!"
**Carolyn Elliott** Whitley County Consolidated Schools
## Why do administrators love Literably?
### Personalized Dashboard
Monitor usage, track progress for select students, or view the progress of all students on a customized administrator dashboard.
![Admin dashboard showing student performance on common core comprehension standards. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e78a210ccd90ebfd01133e_reading-comprehension-assessment.png)
![online phonics assessment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e78b1539a70df1c151da98_online-running-record.png)
### Data Informed Interventions
With Literably’s intuitive, actionable assessment reports, teachers and administrators can easily identify struggling readers, reduce time spent on pull-out assessments, and increase time spent on reading intervention activities.
![Image of a student phonics assessment results. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65c121adf02adc68ba4ea37a_second.png)
### Accessible Reporting
Administrators can easily access students’ results with just a few clicks. Reports and exports include links to student audio recordings, so administrators have direct access to tangible evidence of student growth.
![Image of an administrator's report of student performance. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65e78be6c464e53e638dd7f0_progress-monitoring-assessment-for-reading-2.png)
![Chart showing student data on reading intervention activities](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/65bd66dc22d489db3af93ee4_homepage%20updates.png)
## Backed by Research
Literably’s assessments were developed with R&D funding from the US DOE. The Literably Universal Screener is currently undergoing a large external validation study, and results will be available for the 2024-2025 school year. Literably's online oral reading fluency assessment has already completed validation, and predicts student performance on an end-of-year state test as well as teacher-scored assessments.
[See the evidence](https://literably.com/</research>)
## Trusted by Hundreds of Schools and Districts
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/670015790d6ca58d44b1284e_District%20reviews.png)
## Fast, Accurate and Actionable Results
### Now available to assess in Spanish!
[Request a demo](https://literably.com/</pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/670008c25e3f7bd789e11df3_Spanish%20speaking%20Rudy.png)
### “We’re learning so much more about our students”
Watch how Literably is being used in schools today.
## Get started today.
![literably book](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/63516dcd588cf9795bd961e4_teacher.svg)
### Teachers
Learn more about your readers, identify reading intervention needs, and save weeks of instructional time
[Sign up for free!](https://literably.com/</signup>)
![literably school](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/63516f281d3bff1de438f88f_school.svg)
### School and District Leaders
Empower your whole team with accurate, actionable data to fuel student growth. Stop losing weeks of instructional time.
[Request a demo](https://literably.com/</pricing>)
[or try it for free!](https://literably.com/</signup>)
[![literably outlined logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609585a3d927ff88b33ae9c5/633c31314fa89a205f5c9dbc_Literably_LOGO_outline.svg)](https://literably.com/<#>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Literably**

Founded in 2013, Literably is a pioneering education technology company headquartered in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator Batch IK12. With a compact team of 10, Literably's mission is to enhance early literacy assessment for elementary schools through innovative software that streamlines the testing process for K-8 students.

**What They're Doing:**

Literably's platform allows teachers to assess reading skills efficiently using their mobile and web applications. Instead of spending countless hours on manual testing, educators can now administer assessments online, turning what used to be a lengthy process into a streamlined operation where results are available within 24 hours. This not only saves teachers precious instructional time but also helps them focus on teaching rather than testing.

The products offered by Literably range from the **Universal Literacy Screener**, which identifies students at risk for reading difficulties (including dyslexia), to assessments focusing on phonological awareness, phonics, oral reading fluency, vocabulary, comprehension, and more. Importantly, their tools can assess students in Spanish as well, broadening access to literacy support for diverse populations.

**Recent Developments:**

In a significant milestone, Literably recently joined forces with Heggerty, aiming to provide seamless, science-based literacy assessment to thousands of schools across the U.S. This acquisition is set to amplify their impact in the early education landscape, allowing for greater integration of their assessments in instructional practices.

**Why Literably Stands Out:**

1. **Time-Saving for Educators:** Teachers can implement assessments either independently by students or directly alongside them, ensuring a shorter turnaround for results without compromising instructional time.
   
2. **Data-Driven Insights:** Literably provides intuitive reports that allow educators and administrators to customize interventions based on individual student needs, thereby creating targeted learning experiences to foster growth.

3. **Rigorous Research Backing:** Their assessments were developed with R&D funding from the U.S. Department of Education, and are undergoing validation studies to continually improve their efficacy.

**In Conclusion:**

Literably embodies the future of literacy education through technology. By simplifying assessments and providing actionable insights, it helps educators make data-informed decisions that directly affect student outcomes. Whether you’re a teacher looking to minimize assessment time or an administrator aiming for comprehensive reporting, Literably is carving a notable path in the educational landscape. For more information, visit their website at [literably.com](https://literably.com).
